name.en: Chemical Engineering and Materials Laboratory Ⅱ

department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

goal.en: The laboratory course aims to prepare students with the abilities of applying various experimental techniques to carrying out measurements on physical properties of a system, characterizing new materials and verifying what has been learned from lectures.
goal.ch: 本實驗課程之目標為訓練學生利用不同之實驗技術來進行一系統之物理性質量測, 新材料之定性分析及驗證課堂所學之工程知識.

content.en:
Experiment A: Wet granulation
Experiment B: Observation and analysis of material microstructure
Experiment C: Fermentation
Experiment D: Fluidized bed and its heat transfer
Experiment E: Cyclone separation
Experiment F: Force convective heat transfer
Experiment G: Constant pressure filtration
content.ch:
實驗A 濕粒法
實驗B 材料顯微結構觀察與分析
實驗C 生物發酵
實驗D 流體化床及其熱傳
實驗E 旋風分離
實驗F 強制對流熱傳
實驗G 恆壓過濾

grading.en: 7 points for each experiment, with total 63 points (quiz for each experiment: 2 points; result report: 2 points; attendance: 3 points); 12 points for either the final written test or the skill test of the experiments; 25 points for oral presentation. 10 extra points will be given according to the overall performance.
grading.ch: 每次實驗成績6分，共42分（每次實驗預習2分、結報2分、平時2分）；正式報告20分；實驗考25分；口頭報告13分；額外加分-學期綜合評量10分。

ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 實作/實驗

en: Department:Department of  Chemical Engineering only.Year:Third Year only.Student ID:even numbers Only.
Department:Department of  Chemical Engineering only.Student ID:even numbers Only.
ch: 系所:限化學工程與材料工程學系。年級:限三年級。學號:限雙號。
系所:限化學工程與材料工程學系。學號:限雙號。
